title: Mouichido Aeta Nara, Ippai no Egao o - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Misunderstandings   R-15   R*pe
author: 古池　マヤ
description: The world “Weiss” is watched over by Vicia, the goddess of love and oath. Many countries flooded in the middle of the continent of this world, fighting for supremacy. A bride was sent as a hostage from one of these countries, Lidea. The bride in name only was not blessed by anyone, but loved her partner the Prince wholeheartedly, and merely wished for his happiness. She was keeping her precious memories in her heart…>
